item.title: SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance DLC ‘SEGA Villains Stage’ adds Dr. Eggman
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

The evil genius from the Sonic the Hedgehog series.

Dr. Eggman from the Sonic the Hedgehog series is the first confirmed boss for the “SEGA Villains Stage” downloadable content included with the Deluxe Edition of SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance, publisher SEGA and developer Lizardcube announced.

The announcement reads, “Who’s that lurking in the shadows? Prepare to unleash the power of the Shinobi and face off against legendary bosses in the SEGA Villains Stage of SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance! “The first challenger stepping forward to take on Joe Musashi is the evil genius from the Sonic the Hedgehog series, Dr. Eggman.”

The downloadable content is due out in early 2026. More enemies will be revealed in the coming months.

SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 29.
